Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Homan/Congress
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan  buses temp. rerouted NB: Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Jackson and Homan; SB Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Harrison and Homan: near Homan/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Homan/Congress, due to fire department activity near Homan/Congress.

Northbound  buses will operate via Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Jackson and Homan including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Harrison and Homan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Sedgwick. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Sedgwick.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
